title: Screensaver disabled while client open
body:
I've noticed since using the Alpha (and now Beta) that when I have the client open, my desktop screensaver never comes on even after being away for the requisite amount of time.  This never happened with the old client.  I like keeping the league client open, but would still like if my monitor when to screensaver and then turned off after I've been inactive.

Anyone else experiencing this and/or know how to fix it?

Thanks!

replies.body: That's an interesting issue, and recommend posting about it on the [client discussion ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)boards.  I'm not sure what might be causing that, maybe some active state problem.  The client devs can take a look to see what's up!
Posted in client discussion and got no response outside of other folks who have the same issue. Any recommendations on where to take this next to get some visibility?
